title: Account Transfer Question
body:
I have a question about account transferring.

If I transfer my account to another server, I lose my friends list, but when I transfer back, do I regain all my friends I had? OR do I have to add them again?

replies.body: Actually because of how league information is kept (if you go into the Rito games folder you will find that you probably have an NA folder if you were ever on NA) i would actually assume the info is kept.
